#include <stdio.h>
#include <string.h>
#include <limits.h>

#define min(a, b) ((a) < (b) ? (a) : (b))

int main() {
    char s_input[1000002]; // Assuming maximum input length plus 1 for '0' and null terminator.
    fgets(s_input, sizeof(s_input), stdin);
    // Remove trailing newline if present.
    size_t len = strlen(s_input);
    if (len > 0 && s_input[len - 1] == '\n') {
        s_input[--len] = '\0';
    }
    // Prepend '0' to the input.
    char s[1000002];
    s[0] = '0';
    strcpy(s + 1, s_input);
    len = strlen(s); // new length is original len (after removing newline) + 1.
    
    int pmin = 1000;
    int mmin = 0;
    
    // Process each character in reverse order (from the end to the start of s)
    for (int i = len - 1; i >= 0; --i) {
        int v = s[i] - '0';
        int npmin = min(pmin + (10 - (v + 1)), mmin + (10 - v));
        int nmmin = min(pmin + (v + 1), mmin + v);
        pmin = npmin;
        mmin = nmmin;
    }
    
    printf("%d\n", min(pmin, mmin));
    return 0;
}
